unnormalised: **Courier Mishap in Hyderabad Leaves Residents Frustrated**
normalised: **Courier Mishap in Hyderabad Leaves Residents Frustrated**

unnormalised: Hyderabad, 16/05/2024 – A major mix-up at a local Blue Dart distribution center has left hundreds of residents in Banjara Hills and Jubilee Hills fuming. Packages intended for 12-A, Road No. 3, Banjara Hills were mistakenly delivered to 12/B, Film Nagar, causing widespread confusion and delays.
normalised: Hyderabad, sixteenth May two thousand and twenty four – A major mix-up at a local Blue Dart distribution center has left hundreds of residents in Banjara Hills and Jubilee Hills fuming. Packages intended for twelve dash A, Road Number three, Banjara Hills were mistakenly delivered to twelve slash B, Film Nagar, causing widespread confusion and delays.

unnormalised: “I was expecting a crucial document for my visa application,” said Rakesh Kumar, a resident of H. No. 6, Road No. 10, Jubilee Hills. “The tracking showed 'Delivered,' but I never received it. Turns out, it was left at some random address in Film Nagar.” Several other residents echoed similar complaints on social media, tagging the courier company’s official handle.
normalised: “I was expecting a crucial document for my visa application,” said Rakesh Kumar, a resident of House Number six, Road Number ten, Jubilee Hills. “The tracking showed 'Delivered,' but I never received it. Turns out, it was left at some random address in Film Nagar.” Several other residents echoed similar complaints on social media, tagging the courier company’s official handle.

unnormalised: The issue seems to stem from a recent change in the routing system, compounded by the large volume of deliveries during the ongoing festive season. According to sources inside the Blue Dart branch located at Plot no. 22, Kavuri Hills Phase 1, Madhapur, 500081, the company is working to resolve the errors and retrieve the misdelivered packages.
normalised: The issue seems to stem from a recent change in the routing system, compounded by the large volume of deliveries during the ongoing festive season. According to sources inside the Blue Dart branch located at Plot Number twenty two, Kavuri Hills Phase one, Madhapur, five hundred thousand and eighty one, the company is working to resolve the errors and retrieve the misdelivered packages.

unnormalised: "We are aware of the situation and sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused," stated a company spokesperson in a press release issued at 14:30 hrs today. "Our delivery personnel are currently working to rectify the mistakes and ensure that all packages reach their correct destinations within 24-48 hrs." The spokesperson further added that customers can contact the customer service helpline at 1800-270-0000 for any queries or concerns.
normalised: "We are aware of the situation and sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused," stated a company spokesperson in a press release issued at fourteen thirty hours today. "Our delivery personnel are currently working to rectify the mistakes and ensure that all packages reach their correct destinations within twenty four to forty eight hours." The spokesperson further added that customers can contact the customer service helpline at one eight zero zero dash two seven zero dash zero zero zero zero for any queries or concerns.

unnormalised: Residents are advised to verify the addresses on their received packages and contact Blue Dart immediately if they suspect a mix-up. The local police station at PS Banjara Hills, located near MLA Colony is also reportedly keeping a close eye on the situation to prevent any untoward incidents arising from the delivery errors.
normalised: Residents are advised to verify the addresses on their received packages and contact Blue Dart immediately if they suspect a mix-up. The local police station at P-S Banjara Hills, located near M-L-A Colony is also reportedly keeping a close eye on the situation to prevent any untoward incidents arising from the delivery errors.
